amendment.description: Amendment advises the President to negotiate and renegotiate bilateral treaties regarding the transfer of aliens unlawfully in the U.S. who are incarcerated in U.S. prisons to their country of origin.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to advise the President to negotiate and renegotiate bilateral treaties regarding the transfer of prisoners to their country of origin within 90 days of enactment.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Horn amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
